topic: Open LLMs are great because they are more than enough for many workflows and offer free use & 100% privacy!
post:
Yes, Gemini 2.5 Pro is amazing. But formmany tasks, it is too expensive & simply overkill.

Do not sleep on LLMs which can run locally on your MacBook!

Open LLMs like Gemma 3 can run locally via Ollama or LM Studio,  offer 100% privacy and are more than capable  enough for most use-cases and wokflows.

topic: Despite LLMs: Leat to code! Becasue AI-assisted coding is better than Vibe coding!
post:
There has never been a better time to learn coding! Seriously!

Yes, you can vibe code sloppy apps all day.

If you want to build something that actually works, you need to learn to code through and through. 

Combine that with AI assistants like Copilot and there is nothing going to stop you!
